title: Lemon mousse fruit tart
ingredients: ['For the pastry case', '240g plain flour', '60g cornflour', '150g caster sugar', '150g butter, cubed', '3 egg yolks', 'For the mousse', '2 lemons, juiced', '1 (397g) tin sweetened condensed milk', '250ml single cream', '4 egg whites', '1 (6.5g) leaf of gelatine, softened in hot water', 'To decorate', '4 kiwi fruit, sliced', '200g fresh strawberries, sliced']
